resource.chars:
Mr Flower has detailed with 
much clearness & precision of 
expression, a number of 
careful dissections - most of 
which have been made upon 
animals of whose brains we 
possess, at present, no sufficient 
account 
The Results of Mr Flower’s
dissections of the Lemurine brains 
more particularly, are quite 
new & of very great importance 
If it can be done without
